steps.title: Select the Note to Edit
steps.body: click on the note that you want to edit in the sheet music

steps.title: Open edit dialog
steps.body: Open the note editor dialog, by clicking on the pencil icon in the top right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Edit the note
steps.body: The dialog will help you edit the note you selected. if you need help using the dialog click the question mark icon in the top right corner of the dialog.
